lead_paragraph: France Telecom has confirmed it is interested in the Moroccan telecom market as it considers spending as much as $9.1 billion on African and Middle Eastern acquisitions, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: France Telecom has confirmed it is interested in the Moroccan telecom market as it considers spending as much as $9.1 billion on African and Middle Eastern acquisitions, Bloomberg News reported.
